Using strings on this executable does not give us any important information. Opening it with a disassembler and moving to the main function will give us a std::cout and std::cin method call. The given input is compared against 1234 not as a string but as an integer. This was why the password could not be found alongside the other strings. Giving â€œ1234â€ as the input will give us a â€œYOURE IN!!â€ message.
